-- Generated by CSharp.lua Compiler
local System = System
local HashSetUInt16 = System.HashSet(System.UInt16)
System.namespace("DCET", function (namespace)
  namespace.class("OpcodeHelper", function (namespace)
    local ignoreDebugLogMessageSet, AddIgnore, IsNeedDebugLogMessage, IsClientHotfixMessage, static
    static = function (this)
      ignoreDebugLogMessageSet = HashSetUInt16()
    end
    AddIgnore = function (opcode)
      ignoreDebugLogMessageSet:Add(opcode)
    end
    IsNeedDebugLogMessage = function (opcode)
      if ignoreDebugLogMessageSet:Contains(opcode) then
        return false
      end

      return true
    end
    IsClientHotfixMessage = function (opcode)
      return opcode > 10000
    end
    return {
      AddIgnore = AddIgnore,
      IsNeedDebugLogMessage = IsNeedDebugLogMessage,
      IsClientHotfixMessage = IsClientHotfixMessage,
      static = static
    }
  end)
end)
